name: Wizard Kobold
description: The Wizard Kobold is a small humanoid with a clever demeanor, skilled in magic and cunning tactics, often seen wielding spells and employing its Pack Tactics ability.
memorable: The unique ability to create a spectral dragon visage that frightens foes and grants itself damage immunity makes it a distinct threat despite its small size.
goals: To manipulate the battlefield using spells while relying on allies to assist in combat.
relations: Commonly found with other kobolds or dragon-related creatures, possibly as part of a larger goblinoid or draconic hierarchy.
environment: Often encountered in gritty underground lairs or areas with connections to dragons.
strengths: Powerful spellcaster capable of casting up to 4th level spells, effective in controlling combat and manipulating enemies.
weaknesses: Weak physical strength and vulnerability to sunlight, which severely hampers its combat performance.
attacks: Uses a dagger for melee or ranged attacks, dealing 4 piercing damage, and employs the Draconic Visage to frighten enemies and produce a breath attack.
most_powerful_ability: Draconic Visage creates a spectral dragon's head that can frighten foes and provide damage immunity.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, enhancing its ability to navigate in low-light conditions.
skills: Proficient in Arcana, allowing it to understand and identify magical artifacts and phenomena.
additional_information: Can cast a variety of powerful spells including Fireball and Counterspell.
Has advantage on attack rolls due to Pack Tactics.
Vulnerable to sunlight, which gives it disadvantage in combat during the day.
Intelligent spellcaster with exceptional knowledge of magic.
Strategically uses allies to enhance its effectiveness in combat.
spellcasting: An 8th-level spellcaster with a spell save DC of 14, equipped with various offensive and defensive spells.
test_queries: small magical creature with draconic abilities
wizard that can create illusions and fire
